gift_para_1: Send a gift Box through us to friends and family or buy it now to gift your loved ones.
gift_para_2: Just call us or whatsapp for details and gifting options.
product_subtitle: We sell only Premium to Hybrid export quality dry fruits and spices.
welcome_para_1: We are a bunch of young health and fitness enthusiasts doing our bit to make Bengaluru a tad bit healthier.
welcome_para_2: All varieties of Organically sourced Dry fruits (Almonds, Cashews, Raisins, Figs, walnuts, dates etc..) and spices are available.
welcome_para_3: Place your orders via call or WhatsApp.
how_it_works_para_1: Call/Whatsapp us for price list & to place order. (Shelf life of naturally dried fruits are 2 to 3 months, hence we procure fresh stock every week as per the orders received)
how_it_works_para_2: Once the order is received, we will deliver the product to you during the weekend.
how_it_works_para_3: Payment to be done on delivery by cash/Gpay or online transfer.
subtitle: Fresh and organically sourced
title: Dry Fruits, Spices & more...
